DOC.brief_summary: The study will determine the safety and efficacy of gatifloxacin eye drops in patients with bacterial conjunctivitis
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Safety and Efficacy of Gatifloxacin in Patients With Bacterial Conjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: Clinically diagnosed with bacterial conjunctivitis Signs and/or symptoms of conjunctivitis for more than 96 hours Signs and/or symptoms suggestive of fungal, viral, or allergic conjunctivitis Clinical diagnosis of chlamydia in either eye
